notes.title: React & Redux baseline code
notes.body: This project contains a baseline code for react + redux based apps. Use this code as a way to quickly start any new project.

notes.title: Benefit from client-side Mock API
notes.body: Don't sit idle waiting for backend APIs. This code uses client-side mock apis to fetch/save data

notes.title: Use react implementation of bootstrap 4
notes.body: Reactstrap is included in this code to develop apps with bootstrap 4

notes.title: Simple note taking app to start with
notes.body: Minimal note taking app is added into this code to use as a guide for adding new functionality
